head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CONNOLLY, EDWARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CONNOLLY, EDWARD J.

block.p: CONNOLLY-Edward J. Senior Vice President, Paine Webber, New York City. Beloved husband of Rosalyn E., of New Canaan, CT. Loving father of Kathy Barry and Cheryl Johnson. Cherished grandfather to four grandchildren. Memorial Mass of Christian burial Tuesday, July 7th in St. Thomas More R.C. Church, Darien, CT. Interment will be private. Memorial contributions may be made to the Dana Farber Cancer Institute, Boston, MA. For further information contact F. Hoyt Funeral Home, 199 Main St., New Canaan, CT.
